channel.title: Losing Items If You Die In Wildy
channel.description: I'm using dodian source, and with it, you can die anywhere, and not lose items. How do I edit it so that when you die in "IsInWilderness", you lose your items to the person who killed you?

i think theres a tut on this

item.title: Losing Items If You Die In Wildy

item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

I’m using dodian source, and with it, you can die anywhere, and not lose items. How do I edit it so that when you die in “IsInWilderness”, you lose your items to the person who killed you?
